page.title: 09INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry in Silver End is thriving. Heron printers,Underwoods,(wrought iron works),Crittall Warmlife (double glazing),C.E.G.O.a branch of Crittalls and John Carrs (wooden door and window frames) are all centrally placed and provide jobs for local people.Marconi electrical and radar systems,is sited on the disused airfield,just outside the village.It covers 60 acres and is a collection of large buildings and a 150ft tower used for testing signals. C.E.G.O.has 3 factories,2 in Witham and 1 in Silver End which deals with metal components for windows and doors The company sells internationally to 3,000 different companies.The items are purchased and put together.The firm has 2 supply companies,one in Canada and another in Norway.The company has plans for future expansion and possibly a larger working force.
